title: Did a judge interrupt the imprisonment of a child molester because he claimed to have been raped at the age of 3?
subtitle: A controversial false news site received a case before the court and was added a fabricated element for the production of "clickbytes."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: :: The judge has served 15 years of sentencing a man convicted of indecent acts with a 3-year-old girl because the perpetrator claimed that the child had "requested his rape."
